name: Jungle Jeep Drive Fun
description:
Jungle Jeep Drive Fun

A hunting safari is sure to be a thrilling experience, whether you are interested in the Big Five or in plains game hunting. Safari Jeep Hunter Extreme Adventure 2015 has the features that would make you feel the real African hunting safari.
Drive away the jeep and look for your hunting targets, moreover you have to be fast enough to avoid the predators.

Have fun!!
